Custom CSS Styler â€“ Personalize Your Web Experience

Take control of your web browsing experience with Custom CSS Styler, the ultimate tool for customizing the appearance of any website. This simple yet powerful extension allows you to directly write or paste custom CSS rules for any page and its subdomains. Once set, your styles will be automatically applied every time the page loads, ensuring a consistent and personalized web experience.

Key Features:

-Easy Customization: Effortlessly add or modify CSS rules for any webpage. Whether you want to change fonts, adjust layouts, or tweak colors, your options are limitless.

-Persistent Styles: Your custom CSS is saved and reapplied automatically, maintaining your preferences on every visit.

-Simple Interface: A user-friendly interface makes it easy to manage your styles. Just write or paste your CSS and let Custom CSS Styler handle the rest.


Whether you're looking to enhance readability, express your style, or simply experiment with web design, Custom CSS Styler provides the tools you need to transform any website into your own personalized space. Perfect for designers, developers, and everyday users alike!

Start styling today and make the web your own!
